dict.acceptation: 桔子，橙子；[植]桔树；橙色；桔色；
橙色的；橘色的；桔红色的；

sent.orig: This month Orange, France Telecom's mobile-phone division, began bundling communications packages with its parent's broadband unit.
sent.trans: 本月，法国电信下属的移动电话部门Orange开始将自己的通信业务与母公司的宽带部门进行整合。

sent.orig: The first phase of that project would begin in Orange County and run through Los Angeles.
sent.trans: 这项计划的第一阶段从orange县开始，穿越洛杉矶市。

sent.orig: A fresh orange, please, ie real orange juice as opposed to orangeade or orange squash.
The pumpkin is an orange-colored squash, and orange has become the other traditional Halloween color.
sent.trans: 南瓜是橙色的瓜，因此橙色成为另一种传统的万圣节颜色。

sent.orig: Hands pressing orange juice, orange, lemon and other fruit extract, clean, convenient, simple.
sent.trans: 手压榨橙汁机，可榨香橙、柠檬等水果，清洗方便快捷，制作简单。
